Author: knewjax
Content: thanks for the feedback. I hope to do as much as i can to make it as useful as posisble for as many people as i can. I appreciate your comments and feedback, I hope to be able to apply this kind of funtionality to other ideas in the future as well.

Content: A "glove" cam for boxing would be easy to implement and would give boxing fans exactly what they want.
